modShortDescription: This mod allows you to craft the mega crush energy drink. Unlocks at master chef level 3 or by schematic.
modDescription:
This mod allows you to craft the mega crush energy [drink](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-drinks/).

Unlocks at master chef level 3 or by schematic.

## Changelog

**V1.2**

Updated to A20 Experimental.

**V1.1**

Added mega crush schematic as an unlock option.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Zilox135/A20Modlets/tree/main/Craft%20MegaCrushV1.2)** for A20  
**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1L-3hQcBftqHRl2p--Nq9-GF6yn0dxwPM/view)** for A19
